title: White House discussing limits on government pension fund investments in China: report
text: Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday that the Trump administrations' discussions on what measures it could undertake to restrict capital flows to China had narrowed, focusing on preventing U.S. government pension funds from holding stakes in Chinese companies. This comes after earlier reports that White House officials had mooted policies constraining U.S. investments into Chinese firms. Still, some advisers to the White House are looking to place limits on Chinese companies included in equity benchmarks provided by index providers like MSCI, according to the report.
